messages.subject: People magazine says.........
messages.msgSnippet: ~Thanks Ren to you and your family for opening your home and lives to People Magazine, and their HUGE distribution. Your representation of unschooling was
messages.messageBody:
~Thanks Ren to you and your family for opening your home and lives to
People Magazine, and their HUGE distribution. Your representation of
unschooling was really beautiful.~

Aw shucks.:)
Thanks for the feedback, we all had mixed feelings about the whole
thing. It was a great learning experience!

The funny thing about that photo, is the background isn't even our
yard! We were standing in our yard, and that's the vacant lot right
behind us (that we'd love to purchase) with a big 'ol pile of rubble
and brush the builders left behind!!
Our yard is much prettier, with woods all around the perimeter. Ah
well.....

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
